page.title: 07Alton Schoolday (2)
page.content: During lunchtime we played cricket on the grass and tennis ball football.At 1.00pm we had to do Divinity,until 1.30pm.Then we read until 2.10pm.Then we had play time.It started to rain through it and we had to come in.At 2.30pm we read until home_time(3.30). I went home and got changed and went to play football.At 6.00pm I had my dinner.I went upstairs,turned on the T.V. and watched it.I got fed up,turned the T.V. off and went into my room and turned the radio on.Then at 9.30pm my mum shouted up the stairs "Go to sleep now,"and so I got into my pyjamas and went to sleep.
